title: Replacing a lost or damaged MOT certificate

details.description: How to replace a lost or damaged MOT certificate - get one from any MOT testing station
details.body:
If you have lost or damaged your MOT certificate, you can get a duplicate from any MOT testing station.

You’ll need to give the vehicle registration number and either the original MOT test number, or V5C document reference number - this is on the V5C registration certificate.

The maximum fee for a duplicate certificate is either £10 or half the full MOT test fee, whichever is the lowest amount.

details.description: Includes getting an MOT, MOT fees and vehicle insurance
